DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see safe effective give AIDSVAX B/B AIDSVAX B/E , two potential HIV vaccine , HIV-negative volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study AIDSVAX B/B AIDSVAX B/E , Two Possible Vaccines
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize 1 2 follow arm administer 1 2 injection deltoid muscle 0 , 1 , 6 , 12 month : Arm A : Patients receive 1 3 dos AIDSVAX B/B vaccine ( MN rgp120/HIV-1 plus GNE8 rgp120/HIV-1 ) alum adjuvant . Arm B : Patients receive AIDSVAX B/E ( MN rgp120/HIV-1 plus A244 rgp120/HIV-1 ) vaccine alum adjuvant . Patients evaluate 1 hr , 3 day , 14 day immunization 18 month first immunization . An interim analysis perform patient receive second dose ( 1 month ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients must : Be HIVuninfected men woman low intermediate risk HIV1 infection .
